Segment.name: L3
Segment.comment: To specify the total shipment in terms of weight, volume, rates, charges, advances, and prepaid amounts applicable to one or more line items

Field.name: WeightQualifier
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: FreightRate
Field.comment: Rate that applies to the specific commodity

Field.name: RateValueQualifier1
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: Charge
Field.comment: For a line item: freight or special charge; for the total invoice: the total charges -- expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: Advances
Field.comment: Incidental charges occurring during transportation which are not generally considered to be freight charges (examples - stop charges, diversion and reconsignment, icing) expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: PrepaidAmount
Field.comment: Money paid at point of origin (usually by shipper) expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: SpecialChargeOrAllowanceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of special charge or allowance

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: TariffNumber
Field.comment: Standard tariff number for the tariff which governs the rates applied to the commodity item(s)

Field.name: DeclaredValue
Field.comment: Monetary assigned value expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: RateValueQualifier2
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value
